name: Ultimate Failure Fusion (Anime)
text:
2 monsters with different Attributes and Types
Must be Fusion Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways.
This card cannot be Tributed or used as Extra Deck Material. This card's original ATK/DEF, Level, Attribute, and name become that of the Fusion Material with the highest ATK. Once per turn, During your End Phase: This card loses ATK equal to that of the Fusion Material with the lowest ATK.
